channel.title: Hugging Face Transformers on Manoj Akondi
channel.description: Recent content in Hugging Face Transformers on Manoj Akondi

item.title: Movie Rating Predictor - The transformer
item.description: Many movie rating sites are in need of machine’s help these days. Due, to growing number of people reviewing movies, It’s hard for people to read each review and give it a rating. The aim here is to automate this process i.e machines should understand the language and automatically should output the rating based on reviews given by humans. Transformers are the state of the art models especially used in Natural Language Processing(NLP).
